channel.title: [Pi] Deathz-redemption [Pi] First release
channel.description:
This is my first release and the first server ive actualy coded myself (usualy i get coders). please be gentle with the comments :P lol. credits go to:
Creators of complexion x (used their source as a base) sanity me
features: unique cutom home dragon island (a island i created just for dragons) unique custom skilling area full d claws spec veng(animation works not the skull) lots more
pictures: [IMG]http://i996.photobucket.com/albums/af86/chase1234563/dragonisland.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i996.photobucket.com/albums/af86/chase1234563/newhome.jpg[/img] thats all i have atm
download (ts a package):http://uppit.com/j7gchh9pnjph/Deathz-Redemption.rar
ok i want people to use this as a base but please dont leech the whole server be creative with it maybe add a tree here and there :D

item.title: [Pi] Deathz-redemption [Pi] First release
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

“Lots more” doesn’t give us exact detail as to what is inside of this server… You need to put more time into your topic and more details. I wouldn’t want to download something off of somebody who put horrible effort into their topic, it probably means there’s no effort in the server either.

Read full topic
